plot: About a cartoonist that fails with his old action hero then creates a new one and starts his career off again. He has trouble finding an idea for his new comic then it simulates an idea with fx and animation which later on has deja vu.
title: Imagination
plot_es: About a cartoonist that fails with his old action hero then creates a new one and starts his career off again. He has trouble finding an idea for his new comic then it simulates an idea with fx and animation which later on has deja vu.
plot_en: About a cartoonist that fails with his old action hero then creates a new one and starts his career off again. He has trouble finding an idea for his new comic then it simulates an idea with fx and animation which later on has deja vu.
